sections.title: 2.2 STRUCTURAL
sections.content_preview: Tetra Tech will perform the structural foundation design for PV arrays and associated equipment within the PV array area including invertor/transformer station, switchgear, auxiliary rack, meteorological monitoring station, above ground cable management system, CCTV and combiner box...

sections.title: 2.3 CONSTRUCTION SUPPORT
sections.content_preview: Tetra Tech will provide construction support in the form of Request for Information (RFI) responses and design changes in response to field-related queries and discoveries. Upon receipt of field-initiated RFIs, Tetra Tech will prepare an RFI response within four (4) business days...

sections.title: Content Section 4
sections.content_preview: eries. Upon receipt of field-initiated RFIs, Tetra Tech will prepare an RFI response within four (4)...

sections.title: 2.4 RECORD DRAWINGS
sections.content_preview: After completion of construction, Tetra Tech will produce Record drawings based on the RFIs and contractor redlines depicting the as-built configuration. It is incumbent that the contractor identify any planned deviations from design and obtain design concurrence prior to field-related changes...

sections.title: 3.0 DELIVERABLES
sections.content_preview: Tetra Tech will submit civil and structural deliverables for the PV array area in accordance with the "HQC Deliverable List" attached at Appendix B of this proposal...

sections.title: 4.0 ASSUMPTIONS
sections.content_preview: Tetra Tech has considered the following assumptions in our estimate and proposal...

sections.title: 4.1 GENERAL
sections.content_preview: Tetra Tech has considered one (1) round of consolidated comments/review by the Owner at 30%, 60%, 90%, and IFC Design. It is expected comments would be returned within ten (10) working days...

sections.title: 4.2 CIVIL
sections.content_preview: Offsite upgrades to public roads or storm infrastructure will not be required to support the development of the project. Efforts to upgrade offsite / public roads have not been included in this proposal...
